content.beforeYourBegin: Before you begin you should consider how you’ll divide your money and property when you divorce. You can make the division legally binding with a 'financial order'.
content.youNeedToGet: You need to get a financial order if you:
content.haveNothingToSplit: have nothing to split but want to make your financial separation final
content.agreeOnHowYouWant: agree on how you want to share your money and property and want to make that legally binding
content.disagreeOnTheSplit: disagree on the split and want the court to settle the dispute
content.youShouldReadMore: You should read more about financial orders before you continue as you’ll be asked if you want to apply for one later in this application.

content.beforeYourBegin: Cyn dechrau dylech ystyried sut y byddwch yn rhannu eich arian a’ch eiddo wedi ichi ysgaru. Gallwch ddefnyddio ‘gorchymyn ariannol’ i sicrhau bod yr hyn a benderfynir wrth rannu eich arian a’ch eiddo yn dal yn gyfreithiol.
content.youNeedToGet: Mae angen ichi gael gorchymyn ariannol:
content.haveNothingToSplit: Os nad oes gennych ddim i’w rannu ond eich bod eisiau gwahanu’n ariannol yn derfynol
content.agreeOnHowYouWant: Os ydych yn cytuno sut yr ydych am rannu eich arian a’ch eiddo a’ch bod am i’r hyn a benderfynir dal i fod yn gyfreithiol
content.disagreeOnTheSplit: Os nad ydych yn cytuno sut i rannu a’ch bod am i’r llys ddatrys yr anghydfod
content.youShouldReadMore: Dylech ddarllen mwy am orchmynion ariannol cyn ichi fynd ymlaen gan y byddir yn gofyn ichi a ydych eisiau gwneud cais am orchymyn ariannol yn nes ymlaen yn y cais hwn.
